endpoints.description: Retrieve the sustainability metrics for a specific product.
Add a new product to the monitoring system with its basic information.
Update details of an existing product in the system.
Retrieve an overview of the entire supply chain for all products.
Retrieve detailed sustainability analysis for a specific supply chain segment.
Register a new supplier along with initial sustainability data.
List all suppliers associated with the supply chains in the service.
Update sustainability data or other information of a specific supplier.
Generate a daily sustainability compliance report for all registered products.
Remove a product and its associated data from the monitoring system.
